di.ee.rajapaksha namathi samaja prajathanthrawadi gami nayakayahetata yedena di.ee.rajapaksha mathidunge 44 wani guna samaruwa wenuweni“warthamanaya wataha ganimata nam athithaya hadariya yuthu ya”yi kiyamanak thibe.mema kiyamana asurin ma dakinnata uthsaha karana di.ee.rajapaksha nathahoth di.ee. yana aadaraniya namayen diwayine kawuruth pahe handinwu, giruwapaththuwen bihi wu shreshta gami nayakaya pilibanda wa mage mathaka satahan diwayanne ethuma 1951 juli 14 dina ganu labu aithihasika edithara thiranaya pilibandawa yi. 1948 nidahasen pasu eksath jathika pakshaye manthriwarun washayen katayuthuª kala diwangatha es.dab.aar.di.bandaranayaka mathithuma ema pakshayen ha rajayen iwath wa wipakshaya wetha gaman karaddi ee samangama nangi siti di.ee.rajapaksha mathithuma da bandaranayaka mathithuman anuwa yamin ewakata pawathi rajayen ha eksath jathika pakshayen da iwathwima ma dakinne merata deshapalana ithihasaye sidu wu dawantha ma wiplawaya lesayi.pasukalina wa apa rate athi dawantha deshapalana wiplawayakata pasubima sakas karamin siduwu ee maha nikmayama athishaya radikalwadi kriyawak lesa mama dakimi.
